replies.author: 七海八千代
replies.txt_content:
标题: [1.12-1.7.2][更好的动物婴儿模型——Baby Animals Model Swapper][HAYO][内含BGM] 本帖最后由 尻雨魔理沙 于 2017-8-21 11:16 编辑 
http://img.xiami.net/res/player/widget/multiPlayer.swf?dataUrl=http://www.xiami.com/widget/xml-multi/uid/213535437/sid/1769555659,/width/400/height/400/mainColor/1425d2/backColor/a123c5/autoplay/1



MOD介绍
此Mod仅仅替代了原版的动物婴儿模型，使它们看起来更美观、更漂亮。值得一提的是此Mod并不给动物婴儿添加任何新作用，它只改变了动物婴儿的模型。你仍然能用像原版一样的方式与动物婴儿互动等。
↓双语对照↓
Replaces the vanilla baby models with the models created for the original Baby Animals Mod.Model Swapper does not have any of the functionality of the Baby Animals mod, it only changes the look of the baby animals.You still interact with them the same way as you would the vanilla animals.

使用注意事项
此Mod仅可安装在客户端上，而不能安装到服务端上。
↓双语对照↓
NOTE: Baby Animals Model Swapper is client-side only;it should not be installed on a server.

此Mod如果加到整合包中并不需要获得作者许可，直接加就行，你们大可放心制作成整合包!
↓双语对照↓
Mod Compilations Permission You don't need it!Please feel free to include the mod in your mod packs!

PS：本Mod并无文本显示，所以就不汉化了搬运此贴的原因是因为78的帖子已经弃坑了：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-422080-1-1.html需要注意的是，本帖和http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-646111-1-1.html并非同一个Mod，部分图片由@1026833619 提供，快去17楼给他点个赞吧！
